1.0.name: wordpress/tag2post
1.0.description:
This is a simple plugin, that enables the admin to correlate a tag to a single post or page. The pluging will also modify the way tag lists and clouds are generated, so the tags comes links to the post selected.

Default post ID 0 will link the tag to the actual tag permalink.
